full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA 'DRE KUN GYI DGA' STON MDOS NYI SHU RTZA BZHI BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES LHA 'DRE THAMS CAD KYI DGA' STON @009A *, ,MDOS CHOG NYI SHU RTZA BZHI 'DI NI AU RGYAN RIN PO CHES LHO BRAG GNAM SKAS CAN DU GTER DU SBAS SO, ,DE YANG GU RU CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS ZAB GTER NAS SPYAN DRANGS PA'I DGONGS DON PHYAG LEN LTAR RIG 'DZIN DBANG PO'I SDES YANGS PA CAN DU BKOD, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
